description:
Priscilla is a former officer of the Guardia di Finanza and now an agent for Section 2 who loves and genuinely cares for the girls and Angelica in particular. She has a chirpy personality when not on duty. She seems to have a better understanding of the dynamics among the various fratelli. Her function in Section 2 revolves primarily around collecting data.
Source: Wiki
name: Priscilla
